# Invitation to Qualify: EZ899-250040 Concrete Stair & Sidewalk Restoration, Railing Replacement Phase 2 - ITT

## Invitation Details
**Solicitation Number**: WS4551262004  
**Publication Date**: 2024-07-10  
**Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-29T14:00:00  
**Amendment Number**: 3  
**Amendment Date**: 2024-07-25

## Solicitation Overview
This Invitation to Qualify for the EZ899-250040 Concrete Stair & Sidewalk Restoration, Railing Replacement Phase 2 - ITT is the second phase of the solicitation. It is only inviting qualified suppliers who have previously been selected to participate in this process.

## Goods and Services
The goods and services required under this solicitation are categorized under the following UNSPSC codes:

* Drainage services 
* Sidewalk construction and repair service 
* Wall covering construction services 
* Concrete installation and repair services

## Procurement Details
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering  
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price  
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
**Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia

## Contracting Entity
**Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
**Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information
**Contact Name**: Dumay, Clara (SPAC/PSPC)  
**Contact Email**: clara.dumay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
**Contact Fax**: None
